name: @smikhalevski/react-html-renderer
description: Renders HTML source as React nodes using customizable element renderer.

scripts.build: tsc && npm run rollup && npm run terser
scripts.terser: for file in $(find ./lib -name '*.js'); do terser --compress --mangle --mangle-props regex=/^_/ --output $file -- $file; done || exit 1
scripts.publish-docs: [ -d ./docs ] && [[ ! $(git status --porcelain) ]] && branch=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) && sha=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) && t=$(mktemp -d) && cp -R ./docs/ $t && git checkout ghpages && ls -A | grep -wv .git | xargs rm -rf && cp -R $t/ . && git add . && git commit -m "Updated docs ($sha)" && git push && git checkout $branch
scripts.release-docs: npm run clean && npm run docs && npm run publish-docs

author: Savva Mikhalevski <smikhalevski@gmail.com>
